name: Infernum
description:
Infernum is an isometric ARPG featuring enemy mobs and large scale PVP action.

Up to 16-players fight against each other in a high intensity deathmatch with different weapons and magical spells.
There are four different skills: Strength, Health, Magica and Stamina, all of whom affect gameplay in their own way and can be upgraded as you level up.
If a player is on a too high kill streak he can be cursed and swarmed by large enemy mobs.

Features

* Large scale PVP and PVE action
* Hardcore gameplay
* Various skills for player builds
* Large enemy mobs
* Leveling system
